channel.title: Comments on: Another Brick in the Wall

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: It's a sad day when one of the colonists is lecturing the Queen on her English.
item.content:encoded: It’s a sad day when one of the colonists is lecturing the Queen on her English.

item.title: By: Mierin
item.dc:creator: Mierin
item.description: Actually, 'hots up' is correct in British English, but not in American English. Maybe they have a Brit editor...?
item.content:encoded: Actually, ‘hots up’ is correct in British English, but not in American English. Maybe they have a Brit editor…?

item.title: By: Deih
item.dc:creator: Deih
item.description: maybe they are using them as voodoo dolls or just dolls.. xD that book, is it only two pages long? Belinda must have used it pretty much
item.content:encoded:
maybe they are using them as voodoo dolls or just dolls.. xD
that book, is it only two pages long? Belinda must have used it pretty much

item.title: By: Ghiest
item.dc:creator: Ghiest
item.description:
For those who don't kill the BE's (because were aldor faction farming :P) but rather kill the cabal's over by the bone wastes you get something completely different :P. But imagine my suprise when I step into Arcatraz (still keep wanting to call it Alcatraz, I suppose that was the idea) pick pocketing a lvl 71 elite and getting...
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=29570
Makes you wonder what they are doing with them.
item.content:encoded:
For those who don’t kill the BE’s (because were aldor faction farming :P) but rather kill the cabal’s over by the bone wastes you get something completely different :P. But imagine my suprise when I step into Arcatraz (still keep wanting to call it Alcatraz, I suppose that was the idea) pick pocketing a lvl 71 elite and getting…

http://www.wowhead.com/?item=29570

Makes you wonder what they are doing with them.

item.title: By: Durtnap
item.dc:creator: Durtnap
item.description: Your right, its not my first language, sorry =/
item.content:encoded: Your right, its not my first language, sorry =/

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
It's a pretty obvious English grammatical error in an English publication, glaring error, one might say.
If your first language isn't English, that might not be so apparent, I dunno.
item.content:encoded:
It’s a pretty obvious English grammatical error in an English publication, glaring error, one might say.

If your first language isn’t English, that might not be so apparent, I dunno.

item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description: About "How to serve man". I've never seen that book in the game. Wow.. that easter egg reaches way back. Which Ogres can you get that from? I can't find it on Thottbot.
item.content:encoded: About “How to serve man”. I’ve never seen that book in the game. Wow.. that easter egg reaches way back. Which Ogres can you get that from? I can’t find it on Thottbot.
